main event: A civilian observed a bright object in Dayton, Ohio on February 2, 1955, which moved in a straight line and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as being a little brighter than a star., The observer noted that it sounded like a v-52 in a tunnel., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes., The report concluded that the object was likely an aircraft., No photographs or physical evidence were present for this sighting.
sighted object: a bright object moving straight then disappearing
